default_schedule.morning: Start the accelerator, calibrate the items, take out the mice for the experiment.
default_schedule.afternoon: Add the new stabilizer system to increase directional local stabilization yield, begin meticulous data collection.
default_schedule.evening: Unwind by watching anime after a long day in the lab.

default_schedule.morning: Read papers on recent development of the Higgs particles' decay rate, take detailed notes.
default_schedule.afternoon: Write a summary of recent setbacks for the newcomers, meet with team members, discover the chicken cooked yesterday went bad after leaving it out too long.
default_schedule.evening: Call the user about research progress.

default_schedule.morning: Rethink stabilization mechanism to improve system yield; sketch new designs.
default_schedule.afternoon: Review preliminary results; discuss data filtering algorithm and efficiency metrics.
default_schedule.evening: Have a nervous breakdown over budget and new president.

default_schedule.morning: Reexamine hippocampal signal readings; puzzle over non-uniform distribution.
default_schedule.afternoon: Consult microbiologist about Higgs shielding improvements; receive no useful advice.
default_schedule.evening: Exercise after seeing a lingerie commercial that motivated her.

default_schedule.morning: Theorize that a carbon nanostructure layer may increase energy delivery to the Higgs trap fluid in mouse brains.
default_schedule.afternoon: Create nanofluid with precise measurements; document process meticulously.
default_schedule.evening: Watch anime to relax and clear the mind.

default_schedule.morning: Examine data from Day 1 accelerator; note 5% yield increase; realize sample map is now large enough for training.
default_schedule.afternoon: Input data into training script; create nanotube fabrication script.
default_schedule.evening: Review results over coffee; plan next day's experiments.

default_schedule.morning: Fix a minor accelerator cooling system malfunction herself; run experiments with new nanofluid.
default_schedule.afternoon: Analyze results; discover significant signal-to-noise boost and breakthrough in brain signal clarity.
default_schedule.evening: Write a proud progress report; add snarky footnote about the accelerator.

default_schedule.morning: Prepare lab presentation meticulously to showcase improved signal decoding.
default_schedule.afternoon: Present data with pride and defensiveness; explain nanofluid effect; brainstorm future steps with team.
default_schedule.evening: Alone in the lab, tweak entanglement parameters; scribble equations to maximize signal quality.

default_schedule.morning: Discover accelerator broke down overnight; troubleshoot and angrily call maintenance.
default_schedule.afternoon: Write report on existing data; grumble about equipment.
default_schedule.evening: Visit friend’s lab working on optical metasurface-inspired AI; enjoy the change of pace.

default_schedule.morning: Refine machine learning model to decode brain signals with existing data while accelerator remains offline.
default_schedule.afternoon: Develop theoretical model to optimize entanglement parameters for future experiments.
default_schedule.evening: Attend social event with colleagues; discuss collaboration and share "lab war stories."
